sect1.title: Service Pack Migration
sect1.para: SUSE Manager utilizes &sls;Â 12 as its underlying operating system. Therefore Service Pack Migration (for example, from version 12 SP1 to SP2) may be performed in the same way as a typical SLES Migration.

&suse; offers a graphical and command line tool for upgrading to a new service pack. Comprehensive documentation for executing service pack migration scenarios located in the &sls; Documentation chapter .
